solution_line_template: Sandra had {sandra_num_bags} bags that each contained {sandra_pieces_per_bag} pieces of candy so {sandra_num_bags}*{sandra_pieces_per_bag} = <<{sandra_num_bags}*{sandra_pieces_per_bag}={sandra_total_candy}>>{sandra_total_candy} pieces

Roger had {roger_bag1_pieces} pieces of candy in one bag and {roger_bag2_pieces} pieces in the other so {roger_bag1_pieces}+{roger_bag2_pieces} = <<{roger_bag1_pieces}+{roger_bag2_pieces}={roger_total_candy}>>{roger_total_candy} pieces

Roger had {roger_total_candy} pieces and Sandra had {sandra_total_candy} pieces so Roger has {roger_total_candy}-{sandra_total_candy} = <<{roger_total_candy}-{sandra_total_candy}={roger_more_candy}>>{roger_more_candy} more pieces of candy
